TABLE.NAME: qtype_rgessay_options
TABLE.COMMENT: Extra options for rubric graded essay questions.

FIELD.NAME: questionid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key linking to the question table.

FIELD.NAME: responseformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The type of input area students should be given for their response.

FIELD.NAME: responserequired
FIELD.COMMENT: Nonzero if an online text response is optional

FIELD.NAME: responsefieldlines
FIELD.COMMENT: Approximate height, in lines, of the input box the students should be given for their response.

FIELD.NAME: attachments
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether, and how many, attachments a student is allowed to include with their response. -1 means unlimited.

FIELD.NAME: attachmentsrequired
FIELD.COMMENT: The number of attachments that should be required

FIELD.NAME: graderinfo
FIELD.COMMENT: Information shown to people with permission to manually grade the question, when they are grading.

FIELD.NAME: responsetemplate
FIELD.COMMENT: The template to pre-populate student's response field during attempt.

FIELD.NAME: filetypeslist
FIELD.COMMENT: What attachment file type a student is allowed to include with their response. * or empty means unlimited.

FIELD.NAME: rubricid
FIELD.COMMENT: Which Moodle rubric do you want to link this question to.

TABLE.NAME: qtype_rgessay_rub_fillings
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the data of how the rubric is filled by a particular rater

FIELD.NAME: instanceid
FIELD.COMMENT: The ID of the grading form instance

FIELD.NAME: criterionid
FIELD.COMMENT: The ID of the criterion (row) in the rubric

FIELD.NAME: levelid
FIELD.COMMENT: If a particular level was selected during the assessment, its ID is stored here

FIELD.NAME: remark
FIELD.COMMENT: Side note feedback regarding this particular criterion

FIELD.NAME: remarkformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The format of the remark field

INDEX.NAME: ix_levelid
INDEX.COMMENT: levelid acts as a foreign key but null values are allowed
